name: market for plastic tunnel | plastic tunnel | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/14634/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'plastic tunnel', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This represents the production of 'plastic tunnel' measuring one m2. The tunnel is unheated, made out of EVA (ethylene vinyl acetate) and is expected to have a lifetime of 25 years. End-of-life of this product is also accounted for.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'plastic tunnel',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  plastic tunnel', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
